name.baseName: New solvent cellulose fiber ; Chemical fiber pulp ; Dissolving - filtering - spinning - washing - drying - curling - cutting ; All sizes; NESPS2
新溶剂法纤维素纤维 ; 化纤浆粕 ; 溶解－过滤—纺丝—水洗－烘干—卷曲—切断 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 新溶剂法是用于生产纤维素纤维，进而加工成化纤浆粕的工艺。该材料对于制造各种纺织品是必不可少的，并且可以适应所有规模的纺织制造需求。在污染控制方面，一系列物理化学和生物处理被应用于管理工业操作中的废水和废气中的不同污染物，如磷、氨氮、化学需氧量、石油相关废物、有机结合氮和挥发性有机化合物。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码28,三级代码283.0,四级代码2831文件，在完整版文件中第689页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为新溶剂法纤维素纤维，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65

污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为76，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management62，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisDirect combustion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management62，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management32，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
